definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_while"><value name="BOOL"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">global:Shield_Bone</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO"><block type="gui_set_items"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.BONE</field></block></value><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="item_set_display_name"><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">Items.BONE</field></block></value><value name="displayname"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Escudo de Huesos</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
